owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

organization.description: Optional parameter to specify the organization name if forking into an organization.

name.description: When forking from an existing repository, a new name for the fork.

default_branch_only.description: When forking from an existing repository, fork with only the default branch.
